snippet: San Francisco Opera’s 2015-16 season will be the last under its transformative general director, David Gockley, who plans to retire.
abstract: San Francisco Opera’s 2015-16 season will be the last under its transformative general director, David Gockley, who plans to retire.

headline.main: Adventurous Offerings in San Francisco Opera Season
headline.print_headline: Adventurous Offerings At San Francisco Opera
